Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
    A stripped down version of a Bomb object that is used by the Client. Any changes made to Bomb objects will not be reflected on the Server side.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomb(int owner, int range, int timeleft)
      A bomb currently on the map.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int owner,
    int range,
    int timeleft)
        A bomb currently on the map. Changes made to this object will not be reflected in the game.
        Parameters:
        owner - index of the owner of the bomb
        range - range of the bomb
        timeleft - number of turns left before the bomb explodes
